name: HYDRA (spazimoto)
description:
A Centipede-esque clone done in the style of amphora pottery for a school assignment. The player takes on the role of a Grecian hero to slay the mighty Hydra!

To play, tap E to throw your spear.

AD to move left and right.

ESCAPE key quits the game.

We hope you enjoy! :)

Programming - Morgan DeMunck

Art - Alexander Shopovik

Design - Franza Gregoire
